price: (Yaa Qurayshotaa!) ergasii bakka namoonni yaa'aniin yaa'aa, Rabbiin araarama kadhaa, Dhugumatti Rabbiin mararfataa rahmata godhaadha.
arabic: ثُمَّ أَفِيضُواْ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ أَفَاضَ ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: thumma afīḍū min ḥaythu afāḍa al-nāsu wa-is'taghfirū al-laha inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
